bug.author: hougangliu
bug.summary: host of istio route rule uses hardcode cluster-domain
bug.description:
I notice that host of istio route rule for multiple services of kubeflow component is like $servicename + $namespace + ".svc.cluster.local" in multiple PR, such as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3013>#3013</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3028>#3028</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3033>#3033</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3036>#3036</denchmark-link>
However .cluster.local can be set as a different value for k8s cluster with cluster-domain option. I think $servicename + $namespace + ".svc" is enough. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> WDYT?
